utterance.speaker: KATE BECKETT
utterance.content: I made you a coffee.

utterance.speaker: RICHARD CASTLE
utterance.content: So it wasn’t a dream.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. You definitely weren’t dreaming.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well you were right. I had no idea.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So you liked it?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Even the part where –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Especially that part. I loved that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Good. Me too.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So – you’re on board with this, right? It’s not some oh-I-quit-my-job-I-almost-died-now-I’m-in-crisis thing?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No – … not for me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay. Me neither.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay. Good.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Good.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: But I um – I did just quit my job. And I do have the day off.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes, I do … too.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh. Really?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So what would you like to do today?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Um, I don’t know. We could read.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We could watch TV.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. We could get something to eat.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We could do that, yeah.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA RODGERS
utterance.content: Richard! I’m home!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh God.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You said she was in the Hamptons.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She was in the Hamptons! She’s not supposed to be here.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Darling, we need to talk.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hide.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hide.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Get in the closet.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, I am not going into the closet.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Get in the closet! Go!

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m just … making the bed.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Well, I wanted to talk to you about your daughter’s many fine qualities.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Do we have to do this now?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: And to remind you that our Alexis is a paragon of grace and good sense and maturity, although where she got those qualities I do not know. However –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Right – I would just be so much more comfortable having this conversation with my clothes on.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Oh! Well … yes. We’ll meet you in the kitchen.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We? Alexis is here, too?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: How about some tea? Tea can be very soothing.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: No. No tea.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: No tea.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: No tea.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Alexis, are you hung over?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Well, the graduation festivities and Alexis called me from the party, I drove into town and picked her up. So please don’t get angry, darling.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well why didn’t you call me?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: I tried. You didn’t pick up.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh. Right. Then … that’s on me. That’s my bad.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, Alexis … as your father I have to say that I am – – deeply disappointed in you. And yet oddly proud.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: My head is pounding.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Oh honey. I’ll get you a couple of aspirin.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, no, no! No aspirin.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: What do you mean? Why not?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s her first hangover. I mean, this is a milestone. A rite of passage. Don’t you want to experience it in its fullness, untrammeled by the relief of over the counter pain relievers.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. Okay. Aspirin it is, sweetheart. I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: CAPTAIN VICTORIA GATES
utterance.content: So, any progress on Beckett’s shooter?

utterance.speaker: DETECTIVE KEVIN RYAN
utterance.content: We searched the rental car. We still have no idea where he was going or even what his real name was. But we did find out what he stole from Captain Montgomery’s house.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Montgomery’s wedding album. Why did Maddox want this?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I’m guess he wanted this photograph. It’s possible he was after whoever was in it.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Have you been able to track it down?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Well I’ve got Evelyn Montgomery bringing the negatives in, but truth is I’m a one man band here. I could use a few more investigators.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Well you can take it up with the Vice President I’ve already lost half my people to his security detail and I’m about to lose the rest to traffic control, so for right now, you’re on your own.

utterance.speaker: COLE MADDOX
utterance.content: You’re putting yourself through this for nothing, Mr. Smith. We both know how it will end. Don’t make me take this to the next level. Tell me where the file is.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So you here to apologize for hiding me in your closet?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Look, let me explain. When I heard her voice I reacted by instinct.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, like the instinct of a sophomore in high school.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. Look. I –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wait a minute. You’re embarrassed about being seen with me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Now that is not true. Look, I - this – I – look – okay, this is all just still very new to me. And call me selfish, but I want to keep what we have together to ourselves a bit longer.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Still, it wasn’t your finest hour.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. But maybe I can make it up to you … somehow.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I suppose since we know your mom’s not going to be barging in we could go for round two.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well technically it would be round four, but –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’s stalking us. She knows.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who is it?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Beckett, it’s Ryan!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hide. Quick. In the closet over there.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m not getting in there.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Why? I hid in your closet. Why can’t you hide in mine?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Why should I?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Because –

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Beckett, is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Fine. Okay, maybe I’m not ready for everyone to know yet. Right now.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: C’mon, how’s he going to know?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re here! Just like I was there.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes. Yes, the difference being I have my pants on. Or – or are you embarrassed to be seen with me?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, fine. Just act normal. If that’s even possible for you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s me.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hey Castle. … what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, I was just walking by the neighbor … hood. I only live 20 … What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I need to talk to you about the case.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Uh, Ryan? Uh, no, Ryan. I’ve resigned. I’m done.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Look, I hope this isn’t because of Gates. Or… because of what I did.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No! No, look. I get it. You were just trying to keep us safe.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I still am. And this guy that threw you off the roof, he’s still out there.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey … Ryan…

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I know what this case has done to you. I’m not asking you to jump back in. I just want to show you something. That’s all.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We found a copy of the photo Maddox took from the wedding album. You’re familiar with the guys that Roy ran with back in the day. Is he one of them?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’ve never seen him before.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I have. This is the man I told you about. The one who’s been keeping you safe.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He’s older now, but it’s definitely him.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What – what are we talking about here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Whatever information Montgomery gave to him, he’s been using it to protect you. But now they’ve sent Maddox to hunt him down and get it back. If we don’t get to him before Maddox does you’ll never be safe again.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: This guy Maddox is looking for, he’s the key. We find him we find Montgomery’s file.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Which could lead to who’s behind this whole thing. Including your mother’s murder.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: In all the times you talked, he never gave you a name? Not even a fake one?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Where he worked? Where he lived?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, nothing like that. He um, he called my cell phone. Two nights ago. But from a blocked number.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I’ll run your phone records, see if I can trace the number that he called from.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: This was supposed to be over. I can’t go back again. Not now.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well now we don’t have a choice. If Maddox gets to him before we do –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: But I don’t know how to do this. I’m not even a cop anymore.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’ll tell you exactly what we do. We figure out who this is. We’ve done it before, and with less to go on. And when we do? We lay all of this to rest and we go back to where we were. This is what you’re great at. And I’m not so bad myself. So, what do we know? We know this guy is about 60. He’s a long time New Yorker. Uh … friends with Montgomery, so he might have connections to law enforcement.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He um … he seems prominent. Wealthy.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s right. And he has been that way ever since this photo was taken.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How do you know that?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Look at his wrist. That’s a Nautilus 3800. It was $10 grand when it came out in 1981. It – that’s the year Montgomery was married. May of 1981. How many of these watches could have possibly been sold in five months?

utterance.speaker: STAFF SERGEANT CASS
utterance.content: Javi, I can’t do what you’re asking.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I took a bullet for you, Cass. You forget that?

utterance.speaker: CASS
utterance.content: I can’t tap into the DOD database without authorization. I’ll lose everything, man.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Only if you get caught. And you won’t. I bought this from a liquidator. Cash. Soon as we’re done, I’ll wipe the drive, ditch the box. It’ll never come back to you. He’s former army. Special forces Delta, I don’t know. This guy shot a friend of mine. Almost killed her. He’s gonna keep coming unless he’s stopped. I need to ID him. You need to help me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay. Yes. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right. Watch company says that 17 of the 3800s were sold in New York in 1981 between January and May.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And did they give you names of any of these clients?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. But 9 of the 17 watches were given as gifts to a legal team at the law firm P.P.C after they won a civil suit against big tobacco.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Winning a tobacco lawsuit would get a lot of publicity.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: With any luck we’ll ID this guy before Ryan even traces that call.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What do you mean you can’t trace the call? Why the hell not? Look, I’m on the clock here. I need to know who made that call, now. Yeah, yeah, yeah, Just put Officer Hoban on. He’s the guy I usually deal with over there.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, so this is the P.P.C legal team that won the suit but … I … don’t see him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, it was a 9 man team. There’s only 8 here. He must be the missing lawyer.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Or he’s not a lawyer at all.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Or he is a lawyer but … he operates behind the scenes. He would be um … of council. Like Michael Clayton.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, this photo is 30 years old. We have no idea if this guy still works at this law firm or if he ever worked there at all.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Beckett.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Bad news. The number the guy called Castle from came from a burner phone and it’s out of service. Whoever this guy is he covered his tracks. Look, we’ve put out alerts for Maddox, we’ve circulated his photo all over the state. Someone will spot him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well we can’t wait for that. Did you get anything?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Well, there is one thing but it’s a longshot. The guy used voiceover internet instead of normal cell service, but he made a call in a bad signal area that got rerouted through a wireless network.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well if it’s a network it’ll have an IP address.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, and we traced it … uh … it’s not even in New York.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Then where is it?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: The call went through a wireless network that’s registered to a Magellan Yacht Club in Westport Connecticut.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thanks, Ryan.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He must be a member at this club. Maybe there’s a picture of him posted somewhere on the site?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, look. On the up council attorney list. Now look at the board of directors.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Michael Smith. That’s him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maddox found him first.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The file. Castle!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He’s still alive.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Mr. Smith, can you hear me?

utterance.speaker: EMT
utterance.content: Sir, I’m asking you to step away.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: The file. She’s not safe. 86 …

utterance.speaker: EMT
utterance.content: Strap him down.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: 86. What does that mean? I don’t know what that means!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: 86. I don’t understand –

utterance.speaker: EMT
utterance.content: Sir, we have to get him to the ER.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What does that mean?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: If Smith makes it Ryan’s going to put him under police guard. Make sure that Maddox doesn’t come back and finish off the job.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Smith just gave me a message. He said ‘86’. It must be a clue to where the file is.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We know where the file is. It’s right there. It’s burned to a crisp.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, Smith is too smart to only keep one copy and in his own apartment. He’s too careful for that, he’s – it’s a code. The answer’s here somewhere.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We need to go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well the answer’s got to be here. It’s somewhere here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, there’s nothing left to find. 86 could mean anything. You’re just grasping at straws!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes, I’m grasping at straws! ‘cause if that file is gone, that means they’re coming after you and there’s absolutely nothing I can do. So yes, if there is a straw, I’m grasping.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, we’re not even supposed to be here. When uniforms come here they’re going to arrest us for breaking and entering. We’re running out of time.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Uh – Smith owns property in lower Manhattan. This one, 86 Markwell Street. That’s what Smith said. He said 86 and then ‘maa’, like something that started with M. This building? This is where the file is.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right, so … the building has 10 stories. How hard can it be to find a file, right?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wait. He would have hid it in a place that was safe from the demolition crew.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes, which suggests that Mr. Smith now only owns this building, but he knows it inside and out.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey. Thanks.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: For what? We haven’t found it yet.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s just that I know I would never have gotten this far if it wasn’t for you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey, we’re going to get this done. You and me. And we’re going to start by ruling out all the interior rooms. Smith wouldn’t risk hiding it there with all this sheet rock getting torn down. Ceilings are no good either.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle. Michael Smith, 523. He didn’t just own the building.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He had an office on the 5th floor.

utterance.speaker: MADDOX
utterance.content: Well that’s some helpful information. Turn around, hands behind your back.

utterance.speaker: MADDOX
utterance.content: You just don’t know when to quit, do you?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So you convinced Smith to tell you where the file was.

utterance.speaker: MADDOX
utterance.content: He told me it was hidden in a floor safe, but he didn’t tell me exactly where. Good thing you guys cleared that up.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You didn’t kill him in case you couldn’t find the file.

utterance.speaker: MADDOX
utterance.content: And once I do I’m finally going to settle our account.

utterance.speaker: MADDOX
utterance.content: See you soon.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, we’ve got a minute, maybe two, to get the hell out of here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, how tight are your zipties? Can you move your hands at all?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, just barely.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you have anything sharp in your pockets?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Uh –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Like a knife?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Nail clippers?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. – who carries nail clippers?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you have keys?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, it’s a fob. It’s a remote. There’s – there’s a drywall screw!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s not going to help.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ah, I beg to differ. All I have to do is – – grab the ziptie and saw through.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I am barely making a dent in this thing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, I hear footsteps coming.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hurry.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Man, if we got murdered right now I’d feel so ripped off.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. Me too.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: At least … at least we had last night. We should have done that 4 years ago.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Done what 4 years ago?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Maddox’s real name is Cedric Marx. Once he finished his tour he got a job at a place called Arantas Solutions, a kind of black ops military contractor.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How did all that lead you here?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well, once I got his name I put a BOLO out on his car. Uniforms spotted it outside this building. When I came to check on it that’s when I saw your car.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wait, wait, Espo. 523’s around the corner. You got an extra piece?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Nice. What about for me?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Oh, you mean an extra extra piece?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Wow.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Don’t move. Don’t even breathe. Reach for it and I’ll blow your head off.

utterance.speaker: MADDOX
utterance.content: Okay, Detective. You’re in charge.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Now slowly reach down and hand me the file.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: He’s gone.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Thanks for the warning, Smith.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He knew that Maddox would show up here first.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The file.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: So let me see if I understand. As luck would have it, you three were in the neighborhood, taking a walk.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, many people consider that the best form of exercise. It’s low impact, it has –

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Then you heard an explosion and as concerned private citizens you rushed inside to check it out.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. That’s right.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Is that how you remember it?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yes sir.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Captain Gates, I can personally vouch for that –

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: I am not interested, Mr. Castle, as you specialize in fiction. Let’s say that you happened to be in the area. How do you explain the fact that Maddox, the killer we’re searching for and the man who shot you last year, is the one lying there dead?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Bad karma.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Detective Ryan.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Do you know anything about this?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Just that it appears the safe was rigged to blow when Maddox opened it.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: And what was in that safe?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hard to say. Papers of some kind.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: And I don’t suppose you know what was in those papers and why Maddox was here?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Like I said, we were just walking by.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We were so close. That file would have told us who’s at the center of this and who killed my mom.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well at least Maddox won’t be coming after you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: They’ll just send somebody else.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well unless whoever’s behind all this doesn’t know the file’s been destroyed. Maybe he thinks it’s still in play.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I wouldn’t bet on that, would you?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You want to put that thing away?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well if it isn’t Judas.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, okay, pal. You want to give it a break?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Guys, c’mon.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I came to bring you this.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Paper from the safe?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What are we looking for?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Names. Places. Dates. Anything that tells us what was in these files and why someone is so desperate to keep it hidden.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: 5 hours. And all I’ve got is something the size of a playing card, and not only that, it’s blank.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah well, I’ve got ‘ending balance’ here. I think it’s some kind of bank statement.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Not just a bank statement.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ooh… this is part of a money order made out to cash. That could be a payoff.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And whoever it went to is probably our guy.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well that would make sense.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, in what way?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, all of this started when Montgomery and his cop buddies started kidnapping mobsters for ransom money.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And we know someone found out and demanded a cut of that money.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And whoever that is, there’s something in this file that he does not want to get out.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yo. This – this has numbers on it. And it’s machine printed, it’s an 8 digit string, so it’s not a phone number. Wait a minute –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh – that’s the –

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: This is the back of that money order. And these digits – 08672241 - that’s the account it was deposited in.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: If we figure out whose account that is, that should give us a name.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: And I think I know a way. Do you remember when we were checking banking accounts for that dirty bomb investigation? We used the federal banking database.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I still remember the password.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I’m not even sure they track accounts going back this far.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Whoever owns that account is the person who killed my mom. Run it.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: The account was closed 19 years ago. Belonged to a guy named William H. Bracken.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You mean Senator William Bracken?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: According to the bio on his campaign website, Senator Bracken was Assistant District Attorney for New York from ’88 til ’92.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m fine, Castle.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Bracken’s timeline fits. That was when Montgomery was kidnapping gangsters.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Bracken must’ve heard about what they were doing through the grapevine.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And then he realized that he couldn’t charge mobsters because they wouldn’t testify and then the cops would walk.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: So instead he decided to get in on the action. If they were collecting ransom from mob guys he wanted a taste in the form of cash money orders.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Right. But as his political star rose from Congressman to Senator, he realized he had to make sure this scandal never came to light.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So then people started dying.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Ryan. Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well this would explain why he’s coming after you right now. Word is, Bracken’s being groomed to run for President.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: He’s trying to clean house and you’re next. We need to take him down.

utterance.speaker: BECKET
utterance.content: How? All we have are a bunch of numbers that are meaningless to anyone but us. We have absolutely no hard evidence against him.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Ah… I may have the next best thing. I just got word that Michael Smith is out of surgery and he’s awake.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Smith is the key. He can connect all this to Bracken.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, Castle and I are going to go talk to him. You guys see if you can find a link between Maddox and Bracken.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Ryan called you?

utterance.speaker: OFFICER
utterance.content: Yeah, he did.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: You’re alive.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Join the club.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: What about the other file?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maddox opened the safe.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We put enough of it together to know that Bracken took dirty money.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: Close the door.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: The irony is that he used that money to finance his first Congressional campaign.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’ll need proof of that. Along with anything else that he did.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: There is no proof.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well there’s you. You can testify.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: That will never happen. You see, Roy Montgomery once did me a favor. So I kept that file and protected you, at great personal cost. Because I owed Roy. But I don’t owe you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So … you’re just going to let him get away with murder?

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: You don’t understand, Detective. He’s protected. Untouchable. You’re just going to end up dead. And so am I. Now as it is, my best bet is to just … disappear. I suggest that you do the same.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You know that you know too much. Just like Roy and my mom did. They found you once, they will find you again. And your only bet is to work with me.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: I’m tired. You need to go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, thank you. You just let me know if you figure anything out.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right, that was Ryan. He said they found no concrete connection between Maddox and Bracken.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, and we won’t find one. He’s too careful.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Smith is the connection.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, but he won’t cooperate, Castle. He’s already made that clear.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This is his only play. He’s smart enough to know that, he just needs a little bit of encouragement.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey, wait! Why aren’t you with Smith?

utterance.speaker: OFFICER
utterance.content: Dispatch called and told me to stand down.

utterance.speaker: DOCTOR
utterance.content: Call it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wait, wait. What happened?

utterance.speaker: NURSE
utterance.content: Looks like a heart attack. We did everything we could.

utterance.speaker: SENATOR BRACKEN
utterance.content: Ladies and gentlemen, I am proud to introduce to you Vice President of the United States, Mr. John Russell.

utterance.speaker: VICE PRESIDENT RUSSELL
utterance.content: Thank you Senator Bracken.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I finally figured out who he is, the guy who killed my mom and there’s nothing I can do about it. Did Ryan talk to you? Did he check those security cameras around Smith’s room?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The cameras were disabled.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay. So they’re coming for me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ryan’s got 2 teams stationed outside.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And what about tomorrow? And the day after that?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Let me take you someplace, Kate. Someplace you’ll be safe.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’ll never be safe.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What do you mean she’s not here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I mean she’s not here and she’s not answering her cell.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I thought you had a detail on her.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I did. I do! If she would have left this building they would have seen her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Not if she didn’t want them to. Where’s Senator Bracken right now?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Oh man, you don’t think that she –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Just –

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah. It’s Detective Kevin Ryan, badge number 42344. Can I get a 20 on Senator Bracken? He’s hosting a fundraiser at the Windmark Hotel.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ask if anyone else has called to check on him.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Did anyone call to check on him Okay, thanks. Beckett phoned them an hour ago.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’s going to kill Senator Bracken.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey, Hastings.

utterance.speaker: OFFICER HASTINGS
utterance.content: Hey, Detective Beckett. They got you on security detail, too?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, you know, I need to speak with someone. You think I could jump this line?

utterance.speaker: HASTINGS
utterance.content: For you? Of course.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Good to see you. Are you with me on that? I’m supposed to be kissing babies.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Are you with me on that?

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Excuse me, just – just for one minute. Please.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: This is Kate Beckett. I can see you know the name. That’s right. I’m watching.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: I don’t know what this is about but I am not interested in playing games.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well you better get interested. I have information that will destroy your career. And I will use it unless you do exactly what I say.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We need to talk to Senator Bracken.

utterance.speaker: SECURITY MAN
utterance.content: He’s in a meeting with a donor.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What donor? Where is he?

utterance.speaker: SECURITY MAN
utterance.content: He didn’t say.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Who you calling? Gates?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Um…

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Put that phone away or I’m going to break your fricking arm.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Javi, we can’t let her throw her life away.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We don’t know she’s doing that.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What do you mean? You’re the one that said she was gonna kill the guy!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, yes, that’s right, but – She hasn’t done that yet, right? Look, you make that call you’re labeling her an assassin. That’s a bell you can’t unring. So let’s not make that call. Not yet.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s far enough.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: What do you want, Miss Beckett?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The truth.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Never expect that from a politician. Besides, if you really had information wouldn’t you already know the truth?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Roy Montgomery, McAllister, John Raglan, my mother. Everyone that you’ve ever had killed, I want you to admit to it.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Your mother’s death was a tragedy. And I am deeply sorry for your loss. But I can’t give you what you want.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: When I was 14 I got to be friends with this boy in the neighborhood. Lamarr Dochs. Sweet kid. I used to help him with his homework after school. Well one day he doesn’t come to school. So I went by his apartment and the door was open. I walked in and I found Lamarr lying on his mattress, dead. His little sister the same way, his mother who’s in the bedroom, she had hanged herself. Now, she left a note; she lost her job, she was being evicted, and I thought, how could a woman be so desperate, so without hope that she could crush up pills, put them in hot chocolate, and give them to her kids? And that was the moment. The moment I knew I wanted to help make people’s lives better. And I have. I strengthened the safety net to protect kids like Lamarr. I created jobs in those neighborhoods. I’ve done great things. Just as you’ve done great things.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who do you think you’re talking to? How can you justify yourself to me? My mother was stabbed, in an alley, because of you. She bled to death, alone, in a pile of garbage, so save me your campaign speeches about the great things!

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: You sound a bit delusional, you know? But then again, who are you? You’re a disgraced cop obsessed with her mother’s murder. And who am I? I’m a decent man looking out for the little guy. That’s who the public sees. And every time they elect me, I’m humbled. I strive harder to live up to that ideal, I want to be that man. And I won’t let you or anyone else get in my way.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t think you’re in a position to threaten, Senator.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: See, here’s what you don’t understand. It’s not who has the gun. It’s who has the power. Do you really think that’s you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I have the file.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Smith had another copy.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: 0862241, that’s the number of the bank account where you deposited the money orders. So you’re right. It is about who holds the power. Now I could release that file and destroy you, but what would that mean for my life expectancy? So here’s how it is. The deal that you had with Smith, that’s our deal now. And if anything happens to me, or anyone that I care about, that file goes public. Am I clear?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s a yes or no question.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And one more thing. Whoever it is you think I am, whatever it is you think you know about me, you have no idea what I’m capable of or how far I will go. I am done being afraid. It’s your turn now.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s gonna leave a nasty scar. Every time you see it think of me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate, tell me you didn’t –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We reached an understanding.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: But what about your mom?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’ll get justice for her. Just not today.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Til then, I’ll get it for others.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Your resignation has been accepted. The matter is settled.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Sir, I have the top case closure rate in the precinct. And now that the man that shot me is dead that particular case will no longer be an issue.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Really? Because it seems to be the gift that keeps on giving.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: I’m told we put a Michael Smith under guard at the hospital. What was his role in this?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I – I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: I don’t believe you. You’re covering for someone and I know who it is. But I don’t intend to dig up the past and tarnish Roy Montgomery’s reputation. The fact is, I admire your loyalty. I hope you feel that for me someday.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Does that mean I can show up for duty tomorrow?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No? What does she mean, no?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’ll have to serve out my suspension, same as Esposito.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What are you going to do in the meantime?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh, I’m pretty sure I’ll think of something.

utterance.speaker: THE END
utterance.content: CASTLE
